item.description: Hi-come join us this Thursday for country western nite at the Sea Shell Stage (Half Shell) on Hampton Beach. The band this week is The Goat Ropers. Each and every Thursday during the summer months is country western nite and features a country band from 7-9:30. Check out the band schedule on the Hampton Beach website. Hope you will join us for dancing or to just sit back and relax inhaling the salty air and experience meeting new people or seeing old friends while sharing the common interest of dancing and music. See ya all there!!
item.name: Meetup at Hampton Beach
